title: How to start the game with Locked Camera?
body:
Hello,

Following up http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4094061 which does not seem to work with current patch.

replies.body: I believe you should be able to find those options in the client options under 'Game' for setting it to locked.
There is a camera lock button on the mini map (bottom left side of the map IIRC), also, if you notice the screen is not locked, the default keybinding is **y** to toggle locked/unlocked.
